answers.answer: A suggestion for you is to eat a banana or two if you have diabetes then only a small one or eat a half of a large one.You need to drink more water. and take 2 asprine. in the morning and at night.You could have too much stress or a back or a neck injury. Or the combination of the two. If you have been drinking then the only thing that will help is to sit it out. Drink water!

I don't recall if you have had surgery, but this is pressure due to blockage.  I am going on 2 yrs from surgery in June and I still have syptems like this.  The only thing that helps me is to lay down for a bit.  Laying on a incline helps me. Avoid bending forward or lifting.  This brings HA on also.  Hope you have a better day.Linda :)
No surgery. I go next week on the 4th for the cine MRI. Thanks for your comments!

Hi TharrisMy 16 year old son has had this frontal tension like headache for over 2 years now. Once he's awake the headache is there.. but when he lies down the headache is gone. The worst his headaches get the more he sleeps.I'm no expert but i have researched a lot and something I did find was that some experts believe it's low pressure caused by Chiari.Please keep us posted if you get any answers..Jackie :)

question: My headaches are getting so much worse there is so much pressure at my temples and in the back and I will have this headache/migraine fir days and an on 4 dif types of migraines med but nine of them work however as soon as I lay down it is gone. Why is that?
title: Headaches
